CURRENCY.NAME: Currency
CURRENCY.DESCRIPTION: Start typing to search for the desired currency.

ENABLED.ERROR: Could not enable/disable this product, please try again later.

ADD.ERROR: Could not add new local currency, please try again later.

EDIT.ERROR: Could not save local currency details, please try again later.

EDIT.ERROR: Could not save payout details, please try again later.

ADD.TITLE: Add Product
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Fill in the details about the product that you are trying to add.

LIST.TITLE: Products
LIST.DESCRIPTION: a list of all products setup.

GUID.TITLE: Product Id
GUID.DESC: The id as it is configured on the apple/google side for in-app payments.

DOMAINNAME.TITLE: Domain
DOMAINNAME.DESC: The domain to which this product belongs.

NOTIFICATION.TITLE: Notification
NOTIFICATION.DESC: If you want a notification to be sent when this product is purchased, please select the notification here.

CATALOG.TITLE: Catalog
CATALOG.DESC: The catalog/category that this product belongs to.

BASECURRENCY.TITLE: Base Price
BASECURRENCY.DESC: The base price in the currency chosen.

LOCALCURRENCY.TITLE: Local Prices
LOCALCURRENCY.DESC: The local price in the currency chosen.

BONUS.TITLE: Bonus
BONUS.DESC: The bonus that should be rewarded when a player buys this product.

AMOUNT.TITLE: Amount
AMOUNT.DESC: Enter the amount that will be awarded for the chosen currency.
